column4: how do i make the leftmost partition so that it becomes sda1?
how do i make the leftmost partition to be sda1?
are partitions labelled in the same order as the order of creation?
does anyone know stuff about partitions here?
what kind of stuff?
do you know how to make the leftmost partition to be named sda1?
leftmost?
the one located at the beginning of the drive
are you using gparted live/
yes
with the graphical interface?
yes
sda is your disk, you ought to be able to tell it to partition it from beginning or end. i don't know your hardware though
is there more than one disk? sda and sdb etc?
nope
it would help if you outlined an object
*objective
the first partition will expect to be labelled as the first one due to the contents
the first partition you decide to do no matter what the size or from what end of the volume ought to be sda1 so long as it is a primary partition, i would thing
*think
yes they are labelled after order of creation
okay so how can i help
i've created them in an undesired order so my partition at the beginning is sadly sda2
i'd like it to become sda1 without having to remove the other partitions
